name: Dead Survival War: Zombie Game
description:
As one of the survivors in the plague, you have to fight for survival!
Pull the gun and start shooting! Your destiny is in your own hands.
As long as there is a zombie in the city, my battles will not stop!

Game features:
◆ Various level settings:
The game has a variety of scenes: cities, subway stations, hospitals.... different scenes, different types of zombies, each scene will bring you a new "surprise". Self-destructing zombies, wall-climbing zombies… each zombie has unique skills, and it is up to you to kill the target.
◆ Multi fun weapon props waiting for you to unlock:
Defeat zombies by using powerful weapons such as the world famous Ak47 and M4A1. Or throw a high-explosive grenade to blow up zombies? Just select the killing way you love!
◆ Rich reward system:
A large number of rewards will be issued by passing the level, not to mention the additional gold coins. Complete corresponding missions and become a zombie assassin master quickly.
◆ Perfect graphics:
Realistic physics engine brings perfect 3D graphic performance. The stunning sounds make you feel like the zombies are low on your back... Please don't scream and feel the different zombie FPS game experience!

Experience the cruelty of the doomsday in the siege of zombie monsters.
Complete the challenge mission, destroy the wandering zombies and become the city hero.
